data.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 6 launched in India: Check India price, features and bank offers
meta_keywords: samsung z fold 6 price in india
data.meta_description: The Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 6 is the latest addition to Samsung's foldable smartphone lineup, offering enhanced durability, improved performance, and innovative features. It features a large foldable display that seamlessly transitions from smartphone to tablet mode, accompanied by upgraded camerafes and processing power. The device aims to redefine mobile multitasking and productivity with its advanced folding technology and sleek design.
data.text:
Synopsis

The Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 6 is the latest addition to Samsung's foldable smartphone lineup, offering enhanced durability, improved performance, and innovative features. It features a large foldable display that seamlessly transitions from smartphone to tablet mode, accompanied by upgraded camerafes and processing power. The device aims to redefine mobile multitasking and productivity with its advanced folding technology and sleek design.

Samsung has unveiled its latest flagship foldable phone, the Galaxy Z Fold 6, at its highly anticipated Galaxy Unpacked event. This event, known for stirring excitement within the tech community, showcased not only the Galaxy Z Fold 6 but also the Galaxy Z Flip 6 and other innovations.

Galaxy Z Fold 6 Design and Display

The Galaxy Z Fold 6 retains Samsung's signature foldable design, with slight refinements in aesthetics. It features a 7.6-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X inner display and a 6.3-inch outer display, both offering vibrant visuals. The aspect ratio has been adjusted to enhance usability, with the outer display now wider and more practical for daily use. The device measures 5.6mm unfolded and 12.1mm folded, featuring a lightweight Titanium frame.

Galaxy Z Fold 6 Features

Powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chipset, similar to the Galaxy S24 Ultra, the Galaxy Z Fold 6 promises robust performance and efficiency. It runs on Android 14 and supports Samsung's Galaxy AI suite, showcasing advancements in generative AI like 3D object creation from hand-drawn illustrations.

Galaxy Z Fold 6 Cameras and Battery

Despite retaining the camera setup from its predecessor, including a 50MP main camera with OIS and a 10MP telephoto camera with 3x optical zoom, the Galaxy Z Fold 6 benefits from enhanced software optimizations. Its 4400mAh battery ensures all-day usage, maintaining stamina comparable to its predecessor.

The Galaxy Z Fold 6 boasts an IP48 rating for dust and water resistance, an Armor Aluminium frame, and Corning Gorilla Glass Victus 2 for durability. It supports the S-Pen, enhancing productivity and creativity for users.

Galaxy Z Fold 6 Price and Availability

The Galaxy Z Fold 6 has seen a price increase, with the base model now costing Rs 1,64,999. The 12 GB + 512 GB variant is priced at $1,999, and the 12 GB + 1 TB variant at $2,099. Preorders are currently open on Samsung's website, with shipping starting on July 24, 2024.
